name: Community and Events
description: Tools and events that foster collaboration and communication across the BC Gov developer community.

sourceProperties.title: Red Hat Security Symposium Victoria
sourceProperties.description: Sept 5 2019 - Join the Security Symposium, where cybersecurity professionals can learn and network alongside Red Hat and Intel security experts, partners, and industry peers. No one can solve IT security issues alone. Solving problems together as a community is the future of technology.

sourceProperties.title: BC Developers Exchange
sourceProperties.description: Finding better ways for government and developers to work together.

sourceProperties.author: kelpisland
sourceProperties.title: DevOps Commons Yammer Group
sourceProperties.description: The DevOps Commons Group in the BC Gov Yammer community is an online community focused on growing and evolving the BCGov DevOps community.

sourceProperties.title: DevOps Commons MeetUp
sourceProperties.description: The DevOps Commons MeetUp is the in-person forum focused on growing and evolving the BCGov DevOps community.

sourceProperties.title: Cloud Native Victoria MeetUp
sourceProperties.description: Cloud Native Victoria is the official Cloud Native Computing Foundation (CNCF) Meetup group dedicated to building a strong, open, diverse developer community around the Cloud Native platform and technologies in Victoria.

sourceProperties.title: BC Gov UX Guild
sourceProperties.description: We help build better digital products and services for government. The UX Guild is a group of user experience designers and researchers working within and supporting the B.C. government. We share ideas, support each other and push forward to make our collective work better.

sourceProperties.title: OneTeamGov Victoria, BC
sourceProperties.description: This meetup group hosts the Victoria Chapter of the global #OneTeamGov movement.

sourceProperties.title: DevOps Victoria
sourceProperties.description: This group is about Lean IT and the DevOp mindset, we aim to explore disciplined ways of applying DevOps and how it ties into both business and IT transformation. If your interested in networking, discussions, presentations around the people, process, technologies and strategy around DevOps then please feel free to join us.

sourceProperties.title: Red Hat DevSecOps Roadshow
sourceProperties.description: Held on August 8th, the Red Hat DevSecOps Workshop is a unique hands-on experience for building, deploying, and securing containerized cloud-native applications using industry-standard open source technologies
